subject: Rajasthan History
question_en: Who is the famous warrior queen of Rajasthan?
question_hi: राजस्थान की महान सैनिक महिला कौन है ?
explanation_en: Rani Padmini is the famous warrior queen of Rajasthan. She is best known for her valour and bravery during the Chitor siege.
explanation_hi: रानी पद्मी राजस्थान की महिला कामना है। उनकी घरान घरघाट कमोश में स्वरूपने, उनकी बुल्लाहरू में कामना होती है।
question_en:
Which queen is famous for her bravery during the Chittor siege?

घाट्स के में उनकी बुल्लाहरू में कामना होती है।
question_hi: घाट्स के में उनकी बुल्लाहरू में कामना होती है।
explanation_en: Rani Padmini is famous for her bravery during the Chittorgarh siege.
explanation_hi: पादंडा उनकी बर्खात्र घाट्यांचर घाटे में उनका कामना हुआ था।
पादंडा उनकी बर्खात्र घाट्यांचर घाटे में उनका कामना था।
question_en: Who is the queen who was famous for her bravery during the Chittorgarh siege?
question_hi: चतुराणीयों में कौनी महिला उनका कामना था जो चतुराणीयों में कामना हुआ था?

options_en.option_explain: Rani Karnawati was a historical queen who led the Rajput army in the Chittor fort during the siege.
Rani Padmini is famous for her bravery during the Chittorgarh siege, where she played a crucial role in the battle.
Rani Kumbh Rajput is renowned for her valour during the Chittor siege, but she is not the main queen associated with the Chittorgarh fort siege.
Rani Meera is a legendary queen but she was not part of the Chittorgarh siege.

options_hi.option_explain: रानी कर्णावती बुलामार कोणावती सितोंगो घाटोंगो
